ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Remembering your Lord's mercy to His slave Zakariyya,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Commemorate the beneficence of your Lord on Zachariah, His devotee,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This is an account of the mercy of your Lord to His servant Zechariah
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This is the story of the blessing of your Lord to His servant Zachariah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is the remembrance of the mercy of your Lord upon His bondman Zakaria.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: A reminder of the mercy of your Lord to His servant Zakariyya.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: A mention of the mercy of your Lord to His servant Zakariya.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The mention of thy Lord's mercy unto His servant Zachariah;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: A mention of the mercy of thy Lord unto His servant Zachariah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This is an account of your Lord's mercy bestowed upon His servant Zachariah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Mention of the mercy of thy Lord to His bondman Zakariyya.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [This is] an account of your Lord’s mercy on His servant, Zechariah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (This is) a recital of the Mercy of thy Lord to His servant Zakariya.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (This is) a mention of the mercy of your Lord to His slave Zakariya (Zachariah).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: A mention of the Mercy of your Lord to his worshiper Zachariah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: A mention of the mercy of your Lord towards His servant Zechariah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [This is] a mention of the mercy of your Lord to His servant Zechariah
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:2]   This is, a mention of your Lord’s mercy to His servant (‘abdahu, a direct object of rahma, ‘mercy’) Zachariah (an explication of it [the direct object]),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 325 (A mention of the mercy of your Lord) He says: this a mention of your Lord (unto His servant Zachariah) His mercy unto him was by giving him a son.
